name: leaflet-graphicscale
description: A graphic scale for Leaflet.js that looks sharp

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/Leaflet.GraphicScale.js > dist/Leaflet.GraphicScale.js && cp src/Leaflet.GraphicScale.css dist/Leaflet.GraphicScale.css
scripts.dev: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run dev:livereload -s' 'npm run dev:serve -s' 'npm run dev:watch -s'

author: Erik Escoffier <erik.escoffier@gmail.com> (https://github.com/nerik/)
